EmailTemplate.name: 09-19-22 RET Freshop ABM Campaign Fresh Market Email 2.Email 2
EmailTemplate.subject: Tired of Compromising on Your Picking Quality? Try NCR Freshop.
EmailTemplate.textOnly: At The Fresh Market, you already know the power of eCommerce for your shoppers. And you probably already know that by next year, online grocery sales are expected to reach $129.72B, nearly 10% of all grocery sales. We get it that you all have been ahead of the curve when it comes to eCommerce – but when was the last time you evaluated the effectiveness of your solution? Don't entrust your customer's shopping experience to anyone but you. Partner with NCR Freshop. ${CTAText2} <[[${CTAURL}?${url-parameter}]]> Got questions? Contact us. <[[https://www.facebook.com/ncrcorp/?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://twitter.com/NCRCorporation?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://www.instagram.com/ncrcorporation/?${url-parameter}"> © 2019 NCR Corporation All rights reserved. 864 Spring St NW, Atlanta, GA 30308 https://www.ncr.com/ <[[https://www.ncr.com/?${url-parameter}]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]>
